title: Kiara Advani Advised Rest Due to Exertion, Misses Game Changer Event with Ram Charan - News18
Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Box Office Day 1: Clocks 2nd Biggest Opening For A Bollywood Re-Release, Tumbbad’s 1.65 Crores Are Safe! - Koimoi
summary:
Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Box Office Day 1: Clocks 2nd Biggest Opening For A Bollywood Re-Release

Publication Date: Recent update | Source: Koimoi

Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, starring Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone, has made a strong comeback with its re-release, achieving significant box office numbers in its opening.

  • The film recorded a net collection of 1.25 crore in India on its first day.
  • It has become the second-biggest opening for a Bollywood re-release, following Tumbbad which collected 1.65 crores.
  • Despite a limited release, the film received enthusiastic reception with many theatres reported to be almost full.
  • The film originally released in 2013 and has developed a cult following.
  • YJHD has a total box office collection now standing at 191.28 crore, needing only 8.72 crores to reach the 200 crore milestone.
“In the past, some re-releases started with significantly lower openings yet earned big over time.”

The success of the re-release indicates the lasting appeal of 'Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani' and suggests a promising road ahead as it continues to draw audiences.
newTitle: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Achieves 2nd Biggest Opening for Bollywood

title: Govinda’s wife Sunita Ahuja implies they live separately, isn’t sure if he’s cheating on her: ‘Khali baitha hai kuch kar na daale’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Govinda’s Wife Sunita Ahuja Discusses Their Marriage and Rumors

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Sunita Ahuja recently opened up about her marriage to Govinda, highlighting their separate living arrangements and raising suspicions about his fidelity.

  • Sunita revealed they live in separate houses, with Govinda often spending time at his bungalow.
  • She mentioned that their relationship initiated by her, and reflected on Govinda's lack of romantic gestures.
  • After 37 years of marriage, Sunita expressed her worries regarding Govinda's potential affairs as he grows older.
  • Despite past affairs rumors during his peak career, Sunita is more cautious now that he is over 60.
“Khaali baitha hai kuch kar na daale” (he is sitting idle, what if he does something).

Although they have shared their lives together, Sunita's apprehensions about their future together illustrate the complexities of their long-term marriage.
newTitle: Govinda’s Wife Sunita Ahuja Discusses Their Marriage and Rumors

title: Ranbir Kapoor’s Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani creates rampage in re-release - 123telugu
summary:
Ranbir Kapoor’s Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Creates Rampage in Re-Release

Published on: Jan 4, 2025 7:00 am IST

Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone’s romantic comedy-drama Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani is regarded as a cult classic as it stood the test of time. The movie, directed by Ayan Mukerji, was a massive blockbuster during its initial release with nearly 190 crores nett. After 11 long years, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani made a return to the big screens in a splendid way.

  • The movie opened to packed houses, selling about 75K tickets on Book My Show on its first day.
  • It collected about Rs. 1.25 crores nett on the first day of its re-release.
  • This opening is one of the biggest for a Hindi film in its re-release.
  • Expected to collect about Rs. 6 crores nett over the weekend.
  • Produced by Karan Johar under Dharma Productions, featuring a stellar cast including Aditya Roy Kapoor, Kalki Koechlin, and Kunaal Roy Kapoor.
  • The film’s music is composed by Pritam.
“The movie has made a significant impact on the audience after a long hiatus.”

Its re-release has rekindled interest in the film, highlighting its lasting appeal and the nostalgia it evokes among fans.
newTitle: Ranbir Kapoor’s Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Creates Rampage in Re-Release
